content.content: Dai on Different Networks #3  If you missed last week’s update, here’s a link to Dai on Different Networks #2.  Overview  Where is my Dai (General)  917×375 47.9 KB   Source   Where is my Dai (L2s)  1031×352 22 KB   Source  Special thanks to @SebVentures - Bookmark his site for accurate, easy-to-read tracking for Maker analytics of all kinds. As of 07/22/2021     Solution Circulating Dai Dai Holders     Avalanche 10,000,000 unknown   Binance Smart Chain 262,340,555.49 32,165   Fantom 35,613,836.14 2,953   Klaytn 60,466,697.97 5,268   Polygon $525,205,854 25,518   xDai 14,268,437 unknown    The number of Dai on Avalanche, BSC, Fantom, and Klayton has remained steady for the past month. Polygon has experienced high volatility and currently has 42 million less Dai than last week. Roughly a million Dai has moved to xDai.  By Platform  Avalanche     Top Holders Circulating Dai Proportion     Pangolin 2,130,525 unknown     Current Events Chainlink Price Feeds on Avalanche  The Chainlink Oracles are now bridged to the Avalanche Blockchain, allowing for native use by developers on-chain.  DeFi Yield Protocol Launches on Avalanche  DYP (DeFi Yield Protocol) offers yield farming and staking and recently announced an NFT marketplace as well as a bridge to the Avalanche Blockchain.   Binance Smart Chain     Top Holders Circulating Dai Proportion     Binance Hot Wallets 80,007,734 60.8345%   PancakeSwap 27,670,810.29 11.274%   Venus (vDAI) 27,117,120.44 10.3367%   MDEX 6,655,375.57 2.5367%   ? ? 15.0181%     Current Events Top 5 AMM and DeFi Projects on the Binance Smart Chain (By TVL) Sonar, Tracking Platform for Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain  Announcing the launch of Sonar, a tracking platform that aims to give users an “all-in-one” crypto tracking experience.   Fantom     Top Holders Circulating Dai Proportion     Curve 32,407,283.28 90.9177%   SpookySwap 1,158,770.89 3.2509%   Cream 291,213.09 0.8170%   ? ? 5.0144%     Current Events Fantom surpasses $340 million TVL  The Fantom team recently published a press release in Business Insider promoting an 800% increase in Total Value Locked (TVL) in the network over the past three months, surpassing $340 million in July.  July 2021 AMA recap  A monthly update from Michael Kong (CEO), Samuel Harcourt (Director of Business Development), and John Morris (Director of US Operations).   Klaytn     Top Holders Circulating Dai Proportion     Klayswap 52,032,162.43 86.0513%   Definex 1,408,468.55 2.3293%     Current Events Uppsala Security introduces the MCIS (Managed Crypto Incident-response Service) to Klaytn, for consumer assets protection Bank of Korea Chooses Ground X as Supplier for CBDC Pilot: Report  Ground X, a blockchain subsidiary of South Korea-based internet giant Kakao and the company behind Klaytn, will be working with the Bank of Korea (BOK) on a pilot for a South Korean Central Bank Digital Currency (CBDC).   Polygon (formerly MATIC)     Top Holders Circulating Dai Proportion     Iron Finance 188,989,292.81 37.5549%   Aave 162,804,408.31 32.3516%   Quickswap 17,541,877.21 3.4858%   Uniswap 17,375,707.48 3.4528%   ? ? 23.1549%      716×312 23.6 KB   Current Events Polygon Opens Vault On MakerDAO, Commits $50 Million Worth Of Matic Tokens  A look into Maker’s MATIC vault, with additional MakerDAO coverage and thanks offered from the Polygon team.  Top 5 DeFi Projects on the Ethereum-Compatible Polygon Blockchain  xDai     Top Holders Circulating Dai Proportion     HoneySwap 2,638,540 18.4921%   CHAI 554,237.49 3.884%   STAKE ? ?%   BAO ? ?%    The xDAI chain has limited tracking tools and datasets compared to competing chains, but here’s an overview of xDAI’s daily usage. Transactions per day   Its Governance token (STAKE) can be swapped to through numerous chains and DEXs, which makes the tracking of Dai circulation a challenge. STAKE’s top pair on HoneySwap is STAKE-xDAI with $311,611 currently pooled.    1383×644 64.8 KB    BAO Finance is a farming protocol native to the xDAI and Polygon chains. On June 2, farming concluded on BAO Finance’s xDAI port.  95% of earnings accrued are locked in a three-year vesting cycle.     BAO Pools616×728 22.5 KB   Current Events A Comprehensive List of xDAI Dapps HOPR Staking Lets You Earn Rewards and NFTs While Supporting Data Privacy   An open, incentivized communication mixnet where users earn tokens for running nodes, is launching a gamified staking program on the xDAI network.   Thoughts? Have anything you’d like to see added to these breakdowns? Leave a message in the comments or DM me, @seth, or @JerryAG Thanks for reading! wow, polygon far surpassed BSC in the number of DAI in its network, what excellent news.
We are going to investigate good projects in Polygon, are you up for it?
Please think about including rollups. We have almost 3M DAI locked in Optimism. https://etherscan.io/address/0x467194771dAe2967Aef3ECbEDD3Bf9a310C76C65
Definitely going to be on the lookout. Found a solid list of most of the active Dapps. A whooole lot to dig through, but probably a few gems buried in there somewhere!
Appreciate the link! Will 100% be looking into it for future updates.

Thanks for passing me the web, I didn’t know it compared to the one I use regularly, it is more updated. No doubt more and more networks are coming out and it is difficult to be aware of everything, if there are any interesting ones I will mention them.

Thank you very much for this page, I didn’t know that badgerdao and Frax were in polygon, I only used the same as always AAVE, Sushi, Curve and Beefy. Thank you very much it will be saved in my bookmarks.
This topic was automatically closed 30 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
